mapper.update: UPDATE PROJECT_CAFE_INFO SET CAFE_FRONT = #{cafeFront} WHERE CAFE_ID = #{cafeId}
UPDATE PROJECT_CAFE_INFO SET CAFE_SKIN = #{cafeSkin} WHERE CAFE_ID = #{cafeId}
UPDATE PROJECT_CAFE_INFO SET CAFE_TITLE_NUM = #{cafeTitleNum} WHERE CAFE_ID = #{cafeId}
UPDATE PROJECT_CAFE_INFO SET CAFE_LAYOUT = #{cafeLayout} WHERE CAFE_ID = #{cafeId}
